title: Shazam!, Vol. 1: The Seven Magic Lands Part 1
description: Award winning creative team Geoff Johns and artist Dale Eaglesham reunite to tell Shazam's greatest tale. Forget what you thought you knew. Earth's Mightiest Mortal will be redefined for a new generation.Teenager turned superhero Billy Batson struggles to balance school and superheroics! (Guess which one is more fun?) But when Shazam unlocks a shocking secret deep within the Rock of Eternity, it challenges everything he knows about the worlds of magic and his family's future as its champions!Plus, witness the bizarre team-up of Dr. Sivana and Mr. Mind as they set off to build a society all their own! Don't miss the start of an epic in the making as Geoff Johns ( Doomsday Clock, DC Rebirth, Blacket Night ) and Dale Eaglesham rewrite the Shazam mythos by turning Billy Batson's world upside down!Collects Shazam! #1-6
author: Geoff Johns
